overview: A Transgender woman takes you back to the year of 2020 and all of the emotions she felt during such a crazy time in her life! Her trauma followed her from Montgomery Alabama to Los Angeles where her emotions came to its peak during a very chaotic year. She breaks down all of the religious trauma that she already deals with on top of all of the other events taking place in her life that made her anxiety and mental issues worse than they already were before.
title: Emotions of 2020
